briefdescription.para: Create the library table with default metadata columns.

detaileddescription.para: This method will synchronously execute the query required to create the default library in the given database.

simplesect.para: sbMediaLibrary.js

memberdef.argsstring: (in AString mediaURL, in PRUint32 metaColumnCount,[array, size_is(metaColumnCount)] in wstring metaColumnNames, in PRUint32 metaValueCount,[array, size_is(metaValueCount)] in wstring metaValues, in PRBool checkForUniqueFilename, in PRBool willRunQueryLater)
memberdef.name: addMedia

briefdescription.para: Add a new piece of media to the library.

detaileddescription.para: This method constructs the SQL query required to insert a new track into the library. If the checkForUniqueFilename parameter is true, the code will first see if the mediaURL exists and, if so, update that track with the given metadata information and return that GUID rather than create a new row in the database.

Metadata is passed along with the track to fill columns in the database based upon a pair of string arrays. The metaColumnNames and metaValues should have an equal number of members - each index corresponds to each column-value pair set into the database.

parameterdescription.para: The URL to the media to add
The number of items in the metaColumnNames parameter
An array of strings identifying columns to be fill with metadata (matching the metaValues array)
The number of items in the metaValues parameter
An array of strings identifying metadata values to be inserted (matching the metaColumnNames array)
If true, see if the file already exists. If so, return the GUID found.
If false, execute the query before returning

simplesect.para: The GUID for the track added (or found)
removeMediaByURL, removeMediaByGUID, findByGUID, findByURL

memberdef.argsstring: (in AString mediaURL, in PRBool willRunQueryLater)
memberdef.name: removeMediaByURL

briefdescription.para: Remove a track from the library.

parameterdescription.para: The URL of the track to remove
If false, execute the query before returning

simplesect.para: True, if the query was successfully added
removeMediaByGUID, addMedia

simplesect.para: addColumn, getColumnInfo, setColumnInfo, getMetadataColumns

briefdescription.para: Load the column info for the table into the resultset.

detaileddescription.para: Column Info is kept in a separate table with the following columns:

para.verbatim: column_name TEXT UNIQUE, // The column name in the library readable_name TEXT, // The human readable name displayed in the UI is_visible INTEGER(0, 1) DEFAULT 0, // If the column may ever be displayed default_visibility INTEGER(0, 1) DEFAULT 0, // If the column defaults visible is_metadata INTEGER(0, 1) DEFAULT 0, // If the column holds metadata (vs service info) sort_weight INTEGER DEFAULT 0, // The default ordering of columns in the UI width INTEGER DEFAULT -1, // The default relative width type TEXT DEFAULT 'text', // The type of column readonly INTEGER(0,1) DEFAULT 0 // If the column may be edited by the user

detaileddescription.para: For instance, to get all of the human readable names of the columns:

simplesect.para: sbIDatabaseQuery, addColumn, deleteColumn, setColumnInfo, getMetadataColumns

memberdef.argsstring: (in AString columnName, in AString columnReadableName, in PRBool isColumnEverVisible, in PRBool isColumnVisibleByDefault, in PRBool isMetadataColumn, in PRInt32 columnSortWeight, in PRInt32 columnDefaultUIWidth, in AString columnDataType, in PRBool isColumnReadOnly, in PRBool willRunQueryLater)
memberdef.name: setColumnInfo

briefdescription.para: Update the Column Info table with new data.

parameterdescription.para: The column to be changed
The new readable name
The new global visibility bit
The new default visibility bit
The new is metadata bit
The new sort weight
The new default width
The new type
The new readonly bit
If false, execute the query before returning

simplesect.para: addColumn, deleteColumn, getColumnInfo, getMetadataColumns

briefdescription.para: The media library object constructs SQL queries designed to reference the library of a database.

detaileddescription.para: The media library is a "database-helper" object. Its purpose is to translate common library-centric activities into the SQL queries required to make it happen.

simplesect.para: sbIDatabaseQuery, DatabaseQuery.h, sbIPlaylist, sbIPlaylistManager
